code:
erDiagram
  %% =========================
  %% ENTIDADES (principais)
  %% =========================
  Role {
    INT id PK
    STRING name UK
  }

  User {
    INT id PK
    STRING fullName
    STRING email UK
    STRING phone
    STRING citizenCard
    STRING address
    STRING postalCode
    STRING passwordHash
  }

  UserRole {
    INT userId PK,FK
    INT roleId PK,FK
  }

  Library {
    INT id PK
    STRING name
    STRING address
    STRING contact
  }

  UserLibrary {
    INT userId PK,FK
    INT libraryId PK,FK
  }

  FeedRss {
    INT id PK
    INT libraryId FK
    STRING url
    DATETIME lastBuildDate
    INT ttl
  }

  CsvSource {
    INT id PK
    STRING name UK
    STRING filePath
    DATETIME importDate
  }

  Book {
    STRING isbn PK
    STRING title
    STRING author
    INT publicationYear
    STRING collection
    STRING category
    STRING cdu
    STRING ageRange
    STRING coverUrl
  }

  Origin {
    INT id PK
    STRING description UK
  }

  BookOrigin {
    STRING bookIsbn PK,FK
    INT originId PK,FK
  }

  Child {
    INT id PK
    STRING name
    DATETIME birthDate
    STRING gender
    STRING readerProfile
  }

  ChildPreference {
    INT childId PK,FK
    STRING profileText
    BYTES embedding
    DATETIME updatedAt
  }

  ChildFamily {
    INT childId PK,FK
    INT familyId PK,FK
  }

  Reading {
    INT id PK
    INT childId FK
    STRING bookIsbn FK
    DATETIME startedAt
    DATETIME finishedAt
    INT reservationId FK
  }

  Rating {
    INT id PK
    INT userId FK
    INT childId FK
    STRING bookIsbn FK
    INT readingId FK
    INT stars
    STRING comment
    DATETIME ratedAt
  }

  Badge {
    INT id PK
    STRING name UK
    STRING type
    STRING criteria
  }

  BadgeAssignment {
    INT childId PK,FK
    INT badgeId PK,FK
    DATETIME assignedAt
  }

  PointsHistory {
    INT id PK
    INT userId FK
    STRING action
    FLOAT points
    DATETIME actionDate
  }

  Consultation {
    INT id PK
    INT familyId FK
    INT librarianId FK
    INT childId FK
    INT libraryId FK
    STRING title
    STRING purpose
    STRING description
    STRING meetingUrl
    STRING meetingNotes
    STRING mode
    STRING location
    DATETIME requestedAt
    DATETIME startAt
    DATETIME endAt
    STRING status
    INT slotId UK,FK
    STRING notes
    DATETIME createdAt
    DATETIME updatedAt
  }

  ConsultationBook {
    INT consultationId PK,FK
    STRING bookIsbn PK,FK
    DATETIME addedAt
  }

  ConsultationMicroContent {
    INT consultationId PK,FK
    INT microContentId PK,FK
    DATETIME addedAt
  }

  ConsultationCulturalEvent {
    INT consultationId PK,FK
    INT eventId PK,FK
    DATETIME addedAt
  }

  ConsultationEvent {
    INT id PK
    INT consultationId FK
    STRING type
    DATETIME at
    INT actorId FK
    JSON payload
  }

  ConsultationSlot {
    INT id PK
    INT librarianId FK
    INT libraryId FK
    DATETIME startAt
    DATETIME endAt
    STRING status
    INT blockedByLibraryBlockId FK
    DATETIME createdAt
    DATETIME updatedAt
  }

  ConsultationProposal {
    INT id PK
    INT consultationId FK
    STRING proposedBy
    DATETIME fromStartAt
    DATETIME fromEndAt
    DATETIME toStartAt
    DATETIME toEndAt
    STRING message
    STRING status
    DATETIME createdAt
    DATETIME decidedAt
    INT decidedById FK
  }

  CulturalEvent {
    INT id PK
    INT feedId FK
    STRING guid UK
    STRING title
    STRING description
    DATETIME pubDate
    DATETIME startDate
    DATETIME endDate
    STRING location
    STRING category
    INT capacity
    STRING imageUrl
    INT libraryId FK
  }

  EventReservation {
    INT id PK
    INT familyId FK
    INT eventId FK
    DATETIME bookedAt
    STRING status
  }

  BookReservation {
    INT id PK
    INT childId FK
    STRING bookIsbn FK
    DATETIME reservedAt
  }

  Newsletter {
    INT id PK
    STRING title
    STRING content
    DATETIME publishedAt
  }

  NewsletterSubscription {
    INT id PK
    INT familyId FK
    STRING frequency
    DATETIME subscribedAt
    STRING status
  }

  MicroContent {
    INT id PK
    STRING type
    STRING text
    STRING[] tags
    BOOLEAN isPublished
    DATETIME publishedAt
    INT libraryId FK
    INT authorId FK
    DATETIME createdAt
    DATETIME updatedAt
  }

  MicroInteraction {
    INT id PK
    INT userId FK
    INT microContentId FK
    DATETIME interactedAt
  }

  MicroContentBook {
    INT microContentId PK,FK
    STRING bookIsbn PK,FK
  }

  LibraryBook {
    INT libraryId PK,FK
    STRING bookIsbn PK,FK
    INT quantity
    STRING shelfCode
    STRING accessionNo
    DATETIME addedAt
    DATETIME updatedAt
  }

  LibraryBlock {
    INT id PK
    INT libraryId FK
    DATETIME startAt
    DATETIME endAt
    STRING reason
    DATETIME createdAt
    DATETIME updatedAt
  }

  %% =========================
  %% RELACIONAMENTOS
  %% =========================
  Role ||--o{ UserRole : "has many"
  User ||--o{ UserRole : "has many"

  User ||--o{ UserLibrary : "member of"
  Library ||--o{ UserLibrary : "has members"

  Library ||--o{ FeedRss : "feeds"
  FeedRss ||--o{ CulturalEvent : "imports"

  Book ||--o{ BookOrigin : "has origin"
  Origin ||--o{ BookOrigin : "in"

  Child ||--o{ ChildFamily : "belongs"
  User ||--o{ ChildFamily : "family"

  Child ||--o{ Reading : "reads"
  Book  ||--o{ Reading : "is read in"

  Reading ||--o{ Rating : "has"
  User    ||--o{ Rating : "gives"
  Child   ||--o{ Rating : "context"
  Book    ||--o{ Rating : "rated"

  Badge ||--o{ BadgeAssignment : "awarded"
  Child ||--o{ BadgeAssignment : "earns"

  User ||--o{ PointsHistory : "points"

  User ||--o{ Consultation : "as family"
  User ||--o{ Consultation : "as librarian"
  Child ||--o{ Consultation : "topic"
  Library ||--o{ Consultation : "host"

  Consultation ||--o{ ConsultationBook : "recommends"
  Book ||--o{ ConsultationBook : "in consultation"

  Consultation ||--o{ ConsultationMicroContent : "uses"
  MicroContent ||--o{ ConsultationMicroContent : "used in"

  Consultation ||--o{ ConsultationCulturalEvent : "links"
  CulturalEvent ||--o{ ConsultationCulturalEvent : "linked to"

  Consultation ||--o{ ConsultationEvent : "timeline"
  User ||--o{ ConsultationEvent : "actor"

  User ||--o{ ConsultationSlot : "owns slots"
  Library ||--o{ ConsultationSlot : "at"
  ConsultationSlot ||--o| Consultation : "books 0..1"

  Consultation ||--o{ ConsultationProposal : "proposals"
  User ||--o{ ConsultationProposal : "decider"

  Library ||--o{ CulturalEvent : "organizes"
  User ||--o{ EventReservation : "reserves"
  CulturalEvent ||--o{ EventReservation : "reservations"

  Child ||--o{ BookReservation : "reserves"
  Book  ||--o{ BookReservation : "reserved by"
  BookReservation ||--o{ Reading : "yields readings"

  User ||--o{ NewsletterSubscription : "subscribes"

  Library ||--o{ MicroContent : "hosts"
  User ||--o{ MicroContent : "author"

  User ||--o{ MicroInteraction : "interacts"
  MicroContent ||--o{ MicroInteraction : "has interactions"

  MicroContent ||--o{ MicroContentBook : "about"
  Book ||--o{ MicroContentBook : "mentioned"

  Library ||--o{ LibraryBook : "stocks"
  Book ||--o{ LibraryBook : "available at"

  Library ||--o{ LibraryBlock : "blocks"
  LibraryBlock ||--o{ ConsultationSlot : "affects"

  Child ||--|| ChildPreference : "has 0..1"
